content.text: Read the story. Pay special attention to the words in bold.
content.name: vUKb

content.class: bg-slate-100 rounded p-3 my-2 max-w-3xl mx-auto

content.text: I believe that if I had to tell my story in a brief way, it would be like this: I was born on August 19th, 1960. I was the second child out of seven. I always liked to be one of a kind, so I saved money and went to Canada for a year just right after I finished my second year in high school. I returned home and decided I was ready to focus on college. I studied Human Resources and got a job at a well-known airline. Then, I fell in love, got married and changed the city where I lived and my job. I started managing a big family club and had two kids. During their first years, I became an entrepreneur and I have had different companies since then.
content.name: FDI2
4Cs6
